mapper.insert: insert into menu( user_id, parent_id, menu_name, order_num, path, hidden, permission, icon, created_at, updated_at )values ( #{userId}, #{parentId}, #{menuName}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{hidden}, #{permission}, #{icon}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select: select distinct m.permission from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join role r on r.id = ur.role_id where r.locked = '0' and ur.user_id = #{userId}

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.hidden, ifnull(m.permission,'') as permission, m.icon, m.created_at, m.updated_at from menu m left join role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join user u on ur.user_id = u.id where u.id = #{userId} and r.locked = 0 order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.hidden, ifnull(m.permission,'') as permission, m.icon, m.created_at, m.updated_at from menu m order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
